item.description:
Bienvenido a México!

Well, the restaraunt is not quite in Mexico, but you could be fooled by the authenticness of the dishes served here, plus the decor of the interior. The food at this restaraunt took me by surprise; wonderfully prepared, delicious, and at affordable prices.

I have been in Mexico before, and this restaraunt is the closest I've come to authentic Mexican dishes this far north of the border. I have also heard from others, who are Mexican, that this restaraunt serves dishes that are the closest to homemade.

http://www.newington.puertovallartact.com/
item.why: Very good Mexican food-definitely not your typical "chain" restaraunt fare.

group.name: MIXING IT UP IN WEST HARTFORD AND BEYOND

item.name: Cene en Puerto Vallarta! (Dine at Puerto Vallarta!)
